column2: You will not be challenged any more than usual.
Upon death, you will be reincarnated... somewhere else.
Every 10 years, your sex will change.
The §YCannibal§! trait will be given to you for free. Consume or die.
Every 10 years, your traits will change to their opposites.
You and your brood are cursed with a horrific hereditary affliction.
As you draw your final breath, you see a strikingly beautiful woman- dressed in all black- standing over you. She reaches out a hand. It's time to go.

As you draw your final breath, you see a strikingly beautiful woman- dressed in all black- standing over you. She sneers at you in disdain and waves a hand. You feel your soul being wrenched from your body.
Your body has, once again, morphed itself into the opposite sex.
You are feeling a little peckish.
You are feeling crippling hunger pains.
You are desperate to satiate their hunger!
The flesh... it strengthens you...\nFor just the briefest of moments, you feel free of the addition.
Another year has passed and your hunger grows stronger.
Maybe insulting that witch wasn't a good idea. Your bloodline has been cursed with a cannibalistic hunger. Even if you die, your heirs will hunger same as you. Consume or die.
Consume this hapless prisoner to feed your cannibalistic addiction!
It's Opposite Day once again! Your body and mind have shifted to polar opposites.
[This.Founder.GetBestName] insulted a cruel witch, and now all those who share [This.Founder.GetHerHis] blood will suffer.
Something's seriously wrong with this character.
This character spends their days downloading LoversLab mods, clopping to MLP pictures, and sharing dank maymays.
75% chance of gaining the §R[GetLFGeneName]§! trait on birth.

Maybe insulting that witch wasn't a good idea. Your bloodline has been cursed with a hereditary abnormality. You and every child you have will be afflicted for all of time. Who will live and who will die?
